name: Blithe
additional_notices:
The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en: Blithe wallet is the first non custodial multi chain wallet that will support the near-field communication (nfc) payment, stake and buy crypto assets. No KYC needed.
